message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a rare and valuable item. I'm thinking of a price of $25000 for it. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but $25000 seems a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $15000. I can meet you halfway, but I'll need to get $22000 for the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $22000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $18000. Can you consider that?
I'm still not convinced that $18000 is the right price for this product, Bob. I can do $20000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $20000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $17500. Can you consider that?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I can do $19000, but that's my final offer. I'm not going any lower than that. What do you think?
I appreciate your persistence, but $19000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $16500. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm not willing to go as low as $16500, Bob. I can do $18500, but I'm starting to think that's as low as I can go. What do you think?

I'm starting to think we're not going to meet in the middle, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $16000, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to look elsewhere.
